title: Bug 120216 - Group dialog should be shown even if dataset is not set.
OB: When a table report item is added without setting the dataset, an error is shown.
EB: As per the template requirements, the UI should not perform validation. Therefore, the group dialog should be shown even if the dataset is not set.
SR: Bug 120216 - Group dialog should be shown even if dataset is not set. To reproduce the issue, add a table report item without setting the dataset and try to create a new table group.
